mapper.update: update sj_order set id=#{id}, order_no=#{orderNo}, type=#{type}, crm_no= #{crmNo}, state=#{state}, company_name=#{companyName}, province_id=#{provinceId}, city_id=#{cityId}, area_id=#{areaId}, street_id=#{streetId}, address_detail=#{addressDetail}, person=#{person}, responsible_id_number=#{responsibleIdNumber}, responsible_name=#{responsibleName}, phone=#{phone}, project_id=#{projectId}, group_net=#{groupNet}, single=#{single}, stayPerson=#{stayPerson}, approval_person=#{approvalPerson}, approval_note=#{approvalNote}, approval_time=#{approvalTime}, feedback_person=#{feedbackPerson}, feedback_note=#{feedbackNote}, feedback_time=#{feedbackTime}, assign_person=#{assignPerson}, assign_time=#{assignTime}, build_person=#{buildPerson}, build_phone=#{buildPhone}, build_company=#{buildCompany}, end_time=#{endTime}, completed_person=#{completedPerson}, completed_phone=#{completedPhone}, completed_time=#{completedTime}, create_time=#{createTime}, create_userid=#{createUserid}, meal_id=#{mealId}, model_id=#{modelId}, model_num=#{modelNum}, poe_id=#{poeId}, poe_num=#{poeNum}, storage_id=#{storageId}, storage_num=#{storageNum}, meal_wifi_id=#{mealWifiId}, model_wifi_id=#{modelWifiId}, model_wifi_num=#{modelWifiNum}, poe_wifi_id=#{poeWifiId}, poe_wifi_num=#{poeWifiNum}, storage_wifi_id=#{storageWifiId}, storage_wifi_num=#{storageWifiNum}, assign_company_id=#{assignCompanyId}, assign_worker_id=#{assignWorkerId} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select
from sj_order where order_no=#{orderNo} and create_userid=#{createUserid}
